title: Bringing back kalista.
body:
She isn't as good anymore. 

Shes gets rekt by everyone!

replies.body: Looking to do or build anything differently?

As someone who played her quite a bit until recently, I agree. Too many consecutive nerfs. She definitely needs power back. Maybe reverting one of the very first nerfs, her .9 AD scaling, would do the trick, since she's been nerfed so many times since then.
